channel.title: ELP Television
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ashtabula-area TV
channel.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.
channel.description: Online television network offering public domain and Creative Commons-licensed video content from the Internet Archive in addition to Ashtabula-area produced shows.
channel.itunes:keywords: video on demand, Ashtabula, special services, Internet Archive

item.title: Service Suspension
item.itunes:author: Erie Looking Productions
item.itunes:subtitle: ELP Television: Service Suspension
item.itunes:summary: Due to the burdens of attempting to both mitigate the fallout of cyber operations from the Russia-Ukraine conflict as well as continue with updates to this service, we have chosen to suspend this service so that we can continue with handling security matters. Too many strange things have been happening online and we need to continue our efforts in hardening systems. The expected restoration of this service is post-conflict, we hope.
item.description:
Due to the burdens of attempting to both mitigate the fallout of cyber operations from the Russia-Ukraine conflict as well as continue with updates to this service, we have chosen to suspend this service so that we can continue with handling security matters. Too many strange things have been happening online and we need to continue our efforts in hardening systems. The expected restoration of this service is post-conflict, we hope.
Show notes available in the post at https://coyote.works/2022/Hiatus.html.
